actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to enter into agreements for purposes of repairing the Poughkeepsie Bridge in New York.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation, under the Regional Rail Reorganization Act, to enter into agreements for purposes of repairing the Poughkeepsie Bridge, New York, to a satisfactory condition for use by rail traffic.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Regional Rail Reorganization Act of 1973 to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to enter into agreements for purposes of repairing the Poughkeepsie Bridge in New York.
